title: Ticket #6580: there should be a knob to turn off async reading of late mat item data
description:
The async reader (used for async reading of late materialization item data) does not work on exec-14 in the batlab and the reason for the failure is unknown. The code does not report any error, it just never makes any progress.

Because of this, the async reader should default to synchronous reads on Windows, and there should be a knob to enable the async behavior for now. The knob will be called ENABLE_ASYNC_LATE_MATERIALIZE_ITEM_DATA
